caption: elastic.co
description: Role-based access control and other Elasticsearch security features help Vandis, a networking, firewalls, logging, and syslog threat analysis company.
message: It's part 2 of our conversation with the fine folks at Vandis. Check out how they utilize role-based access control using #Security for #Elasticsearch and what role #Alerting plays in keeping them ahead of the game. http://go.es.io/2aqFSTy
name: Security for Elasticsearch in a logging use case at Vandis.
